joi.object.oxor: {{label}} contains a conflict between optional exclusive peers {{peersWithLabels}}

joi.number.max: {{label}} must be less than or equal to {{limit}}
joi.number.precision: {{label}} must have no more than {{limit}} decimal places
joi.number.ref: {{label}} references '{{ref}}' which is not a number
joi.string.min: {{label}} length must be at least {{limit}} characters long
joi.string.max: {{label}} length must be less than or equal to {{limit}} characters long

joi.string.hexAlign: {{label}} hex decoded representation must be byte aligned
